name: wg-quick
description: set up a WireGuard interface simply

subcommands.name: up
subcommands.description: add and set up an interface

subcommands.name: down
subcommands.description: tear down and remove an interface

subcommands.name: save
subcommands.description: saves the configuration of an existing interface without bringing the interface down

subcommands.name: strip
subcommands.description: output a configuration file with all wg-quick(8)-specific options removed, suitable for use with wg(8)

tldr:
> Quickly set up WireGuard tunnels based on config files.
> More information: <https://www.wireguard.com/quickstart/>.

- Set up a VPN tunnel:

`wg-quick up {{interface_name}}`

- Delete a VPN tunnel:

`wg-quick down {{interface_name}}`
